Articles.Content:
HI all,

I have had trouble seeing my Imgur albums in my Stock craft repository (Link below).

Is this an issue with the number of albums on the page??

What happened to the link?

Also MajorJim, you need to use imgur tags, like this without the spaces:

[ imgur ] imgurGalleryCode [ /imgur ]

Also, use the imgur gallery code, it's the last few characters without the image number, so just Tk4u3 for example

HI all,

I have had trouble seeing my Imgur albums in my Stock craft repository (Link below).

Is this an issue with the number of albums on the page??

What Sal said.

I see this quite often on forum posts here. You should be using this code in your post (this is the link to your album):

[noparse]

Javascript is disabled. View full album
[/noparse]

Just copy/paste that, or write it down.

@Sal_Vager: You can use the bracketed BB code [noparse][noparse][/noparse] and the accompanying /noparse in order to post BB code without it... well, being parsed. [noparse][/noparse]

Edited August 7, 2014 by Targa

What happened to the link?

Also MajorJim, you need to use imgur tags, like this without the spaces:

[ imgur ] imgurGalleryCode [ /imgur ]

Also, use the imgur gallery code, it's the last few characters without the image number, so just Tk4u3 for example

Guys, guys, the link is my sig. In blue, below.

I know how to post the links to the albums. They are all there in my post but recently they haven't been showing..

Some say they can see it others not.

Hmm, most of those go to the missing image page :/

Have you got the original url's Majorjim?

Hmm, most of those go to the missing image page :/

Have you got the original url's Majorjim?

Do you mean the album name: reaIg or this: http://imgur.com/a/reaIg#0 ?

All the albums open fine on the imgur page.

I took a peek at the page load timeline in another browser. I see about 100 jpgs requested and received from Imgur (HTTP 200 OK). They're never displayed, though. I can also get the album you linked to display using the normal IMGUR tags in a preview in this thread. Maybe Imgur can't handle that many images on one page?

Side note: one image (silhouette_of_a_winged_dragon_0071-0907-1819-1160_SMU.jpg from www.rosiepiter.com) was unavailable (HTTP 403 Forbidden).

I took a peek at the page load timeline in another browser. I see about 100 jpgs requested and received from Imgur (HTTP 200 OK). They're never displayed, though. I can also get the album you linked to display using the normal IMGUR tags in a preview in this thread. Maybe Imgur can't handle that many images on one page?

Side note: one image (silhouette_of_a_winged_dragon_0071-0907-1819-1160_SMU.jpg from www.rosiepiter.com) was unavailable (HTTP 403 Forbidden).

Hmm. Thanks for testing this mate. I will remove a few and see if it helps.

Ok, I removed three of the albums but still I cant open any of them..

Could a moderator have a look and see what the issue is?
I can't see an error in the BBCode. That's a weird one, alright. Might have to get Kasper or Sal to take a gander and see if it's on the forum's end or Imgur's. :/

I can't see an error in the BBCode. That's a weird one, alright. Might have to get Kasper or Sal to take a gander and see if it's on the forum's end or Imgur's. :/

Thank you Vexx32 I really appreciate that.

I did some testing and removing all the spoiler tags fixed it.

But now the page takes a aeon to load.
I'll forward that to Kasper; maybe the spoiler tags are breaking the iframe somehow... weird.

None yet..

Ok thanks for the update. I'm sure it has to do with the number of albums there. I will cut some of the pics and try again.
